languages.text: {n}Изучив субстанцию пристальным взглядом, техножрец решительно произносит:{/n} "Запрос отклонен. Я не могу осквернить свое Священное железо контактом с этим веществом".
{n}After studying the substance closely, Pasqal says firmly,{/n} "Request denied. I cannot defile my Ferrum Sanctum by making contact with this substance."
languages.original_text: {n}Изучив субстанцию пристальным взглядом, техножрец решительно произносит:{/n} "Запрос отклонен. Я не могу осквернить свое Священное железо контактом с этим веществом".

traits.locale_text: {n}After studying the substance closely, Pasqal says firmly,{/n} "Request denied. I cannot defile my Ferrum Sanctum by making contact with this substance."
{n}After studying the substance closely, Pasqal says firmly,{/n} "Request denied. I cannot defile my Ferrum Sanctum by making contact with this substance."

{n}After studying the substance closely, Pasqal says firmly,{/n} "Request denied. I cannot defile my Ferrum Sanctum by making contact with this substance."

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡仔细研究了这种物质，随后坚定地开了口。{/n}“请求已拒绝。我不能接触这种物质，这会玷污我的钢铁圣所。”
languages.original_text: {n}After studying the substance closely, Pasqal says firmly,{/n} "Request denied. I cannot defile my Ferrum Sanctum by making contact with this substance."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡仔细研究了这种物质，随后坚定地开了口。{/n}“请求已拒绝。我不能接触这种物质，这会玷污我的钢铁圣所。”

languages.text: {n}Tras estudiar la sustancia con detenimiento, Pasqal responde con firmeza:{/n} «Petición denegada. No puedo mancillar mi Ferrum Sanctum mediante el contacto con esta sustancia».
languages.original_text: {n}After studying the substance closely, Pasqal says firmly,{/n} "Request denied. I cannot defile my Ferrum Sanctum by making contact with this substance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras estudiar la sustancia con detenimiento, Pasqal responde con firmeza:{/n} «Petición denegada. No puedo mancillar mi Ferrum Sanctum mediante el contacto con esta sustancia».

languages.text: {n}ヘドロをよく観察した後、パスカルははっきりと答えた。{/n}「要求を拒否します。この物質と接触してしまうと、自分のフェルム・サンクトゥムが汚れてしまいますので」
languages.original_text: {n}After studying the substance closely, Pasqal says firmly,{/n} "Request denied. I cannot defile my Ferrum Sanctum by making contact with this substance."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヘドロをよく観察した後、パスカルははっきりと答えた。{/n}「要求を拒否します。この物質と接触してしまうと、自分のフェルム・サンクトゥムが汚れてしまいますので」

languages.text: {n}Nach gründlichem Studium der Substanz sagt Pasqal mit fester Stimme:{/n} "Anfrage abgewiesen. Ich kann mein Ferrum Sanctum nicht durch Kontakt mit dieser Substanz entweihen."
languages.original_text: {n}After studying the substance closely, Pasqal says firmly,{/n} "Request denied. I cannot defile my Ferrum Sanctum by making contact with this substance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach gründlichem Studium der Substanz sagt Pasqal mit fester Stimme:{/n} "Anfrage abgewiesen. Ich kann mein Ferrum Sanctum nicht durch Kontakt mit dieser Substanz entweihen."

languages.text: {n}Après avoir longuement étudié la substance, Pasqal vous répond sur un ton catégorique :{/n} « Requête refusée. Je ne peux entrer en contact avec cette substance au risque de souiller mon Ferrum Sanctum. »
languages.original_text: {n}After studying the substance closely, Pasqal says firmly,{/n} "Request denied. I cannot defile my Ferrum Sanctum by making contact with this substance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir longuement étudié la substance, Pasqal vous répond sur un ton catégorique :{/n} « Requête refusée. Je ne peux entrer en contact avec cette substance au risque de souiller mon Ferrum Sanctum. »

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, sıvı maddeyi dikkatle inceledikten sonra kararlı bir şekilde konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Talep reddedildi. Bu maddeye temas ederek Demir Kutak'ımı kirletemem."
languages.original_text: {n}After studying the substance closely, Pasqal says firmly,{/n} "Request denied. I cannot defile my Ferrum Sanctum by making contact with this substance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, sıvı maddeyi dikkatle inceledikten sonra kararlı bir şekilde konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Talep reddedildi. Bu maddeye temas ederek Demir Kutak'ımı kirletemem."
